column4: Hi, how hard would it be to upgrade ubuntu from 5.10 to 6.06 when it comes out?
i don't want to have to burn another cd if possible
change your repos /etc/apt/sources.list to point to dapper isn't of breezy
either permissions or you didn't mount it correctly
add user,users in /etc/fstab options for windows mount
you added windows mount in fstab already right?
ok, paste the contents of your fstab in paste bin
i don't use that script so i couldn't comment
paste bin your fstab ill have a look at it for you
